metadata.title: CVE-2021-43519 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Stack overflow in lua_resume of ldo.c in Lua Interpreter 5.1.0~5.4.4 allowsattackers to perform a Denial of Service via a crafted script file.

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
